entry.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Backend: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

entry.title: emxemirc/swiping-hooks: Lightweight React hook for swipe gesture detection with support for left, right, up, and down directions. Built with TypeScript, optimized for touch/mouse interactions, carousel navigation, and mobile interfaces. Zero dependencies, easily customizable threshold, and comprehensive browser support.
entry.content: Lightweight React hook for swipe gesture detection with support for left, right, up, and down directions. Built with TypeScript, optimized for touch/mouse interactions, carousel navigation, and mobile interfaces. Zero dependencies, easily customizable threshold, and comprehensive browser support.
